sections.heading: CLERKS OF DISTRICT COURTSArt. 281
sections.text: Certain articles not applicable to Civil District Court for the Parish of OrleansThe provisions of Articles 282 through 286 do not apply to the clerk and the deputy clerks of the Civil District Court for the Parish of Orleans.
